title: Afghanistan NEEDS Prayer | Guests: Avi Yemini & Peter Boghossian | 9/13/21
description:
Glenn starts off the show by talking with Avi Yemini about Australia and how far the country has gone to fight COVID, resulting in restricting the everyday lives of its citizens. Glenn gives a chilling update on the rescue mission in Afghanistan. The State Department is still standing in the way of the Afghanistan rescue mission. Former Portland State University professor Peter Boghossian joins to explain why he left the university. BlazeTV hosts Elijah Schaffer and Sydney Watson join to discuss their new show, "You Are Here."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
